page.title: 02MAIN FEATURES OF OUR AREA
page.content:
MOST OF THE WOODLAND IS IN THE{ {NORTH-EAST}AND THE{SOUTH-WEST}AND HAS BEEN SPECIALLY PLANTED FOR SHELTER.
{LILLIESLEAF}IS POSITIONED ON A RIDGE RUNNING{EAST-WEST.}THE RIDGE IS ABOVE THE RIVER{ALE}WHICH RUNS FROM{ALEMOOR} NEAR{HAWICK}AND JOINS THE{TEVIOT}NEAR{ {ANCRUM}AND THEN THE{TEVIOT}JOINS THE{ {TWEED}AT{KELSO}AND THEN RUNS INTO THE SEA AT{BERWICK-UPON-TWEED.}
{LILLIESLEAF}HAS A POPULATION OF APPROX.{180}PEOPLE.
IN THE VILLAGE OF{LILLIESLEAF}THERE ARE 2 PUBS,{THE CROSS KEYS}AND{THE {PLOUGH INN.}THERE ARE 2 GROCERS SHOPS AND 1 POST OFFICE,PLUS A GARAGE.THERE IS 1 SCHOOL AND IT IS A PRIMARY SCHOOL.THERE IS ALSO A PLAY SCHOOL.THE {ROYAL BANK OF SCOTLAND}HAVE A PLACE.
